content.text:
Mr. HATCH. Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that Martin 
Pippins, a detailee on the Senate Committee on Finance, be granted 
floor privileges for the duration of this Congress.
content.speaker: Mr. HATCH

content.text: The PRESIDING OFFICER. Without objection, it is so ordered.
content.speaker: The PRESIDING OFFICER

content.text:
Mr. PETERS. Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that privileges of 
the floor be granted to the following member of my staff, Sarah 
Anderson, for today's session.
content.speaker: Mr. PETERS

content.text: The PRESIDING OFFICER. Without objection, it is so ordered.
content.speaker: The PRESIDING OFFICER
